attributes.action: stop the 3 Members of Parliament currently facing criminal charges from invoking Parliamentary privilege for personal liabilities and objectives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The three MPs named in this petition alegedly will seek to avoid trial in a criminal court for the charges of financial crime currently levied against them by claiming Parliamentary privilege. Their intention seems a cynical misuse, if not abuse, of this privilege, which will deepen public mistrust of Parliament, and they should be stopped.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
